wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|November}}
Events that occurred on 15 November.
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1892]]''' - [[Arthur Tolkien|Arthur]], [[Mabel Suffield|Mabel]], two household servants, and the nurse holding [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Ronald]] pose for a picture in the garden at Bank House. The photograph is used in Tolkien Christmas cards sent to family and friends. The image is reproduced in ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography]]'' and ''[[The Tolkien Family Album]]''.
* '''[[1937]]''' - Tolkien submits to [[Allen & Unwin]] a bundle of manuscripts including ''[[The Lay of Leithian]]'' ("Long Poem"); ''[[Quenta Silmarillion (Lost Road)|Quenta Silmarillion]]'', ''[[Ainulindalë (Lost Road)|Ainulindalë]]'', ''[[Ambarkanta]]'',  and ''[[The Fall of Númenor (chapter)]]'' ("The Gnomes Material"); [[The Lost Road]]; and ''[[Farmer Giles of Ham]]'' and ''[[Mr. Bliss]]''. They also discuss ''[[Beowulf and the Finnsburg Fragment|Beowulf]]''.
* '''[[1961]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 233]].
* '''[[1961]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Jane Neave (15 November 1961)|a letter to Jane Neave]].
* '''[[1978]] - The [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|1978 animated film]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' premières in the United States.'''
* '''[[1983]]''' - Actor [[John Le Mesurier]] dies.
* '''[[1983]]''' - Illustrator [[Eric Fraser]] dies.
* '''[[1991]]''' - ''[[After the King|After the King: Stories In Honor of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' is published.
* '''[[2007]]''' - ''[[Myth and Magic: Art according to the Inklings]]'' is published.
* '''[[2010]]''' - ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'' issue [[Parma Eldalamberon 19|19]] is published.
* '''[[2014]]''' - ''[[War of Words: Soldier-Poets of the Somme]]'' is aired.
* '''[[2014]]''' - ''[[ArdaCraft]]'' begins building Middle-earth.
* '''[[2022]] - ''[[The Fall of Númenor (book)|The Fall of Númenor]]'' is published.'''
* '''[[2022]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Before the Shadow]]'' is released online.

==In Arda==
* {{FA|495}}:
** [[Tuor]], guided by [[Voronwë]], travels to [[Gondolin]] in order to deliver [[Ulmo]]'s message to [[Turgon]].
